custom message6.message: A textbox to type in the answer

custom_text1.message: What has been rewarding about your caregiving?

custom_text2.message: What do you most look forward to/enjoy/value about taking care of your loved one?

custom_text3.message: What are some good memories of your loved one that you can draw on to keep you going?

custom_text4.message: What kind of meaning do you find in caregiving?

custom_okay1.message: Remember that while you are providing care for a loved one, you also need take care of yourself. Try to take some time now to set a self-care goal for today.

custom_okay2.message: You're providing a familiar/secure/routine/pleasant environment for insert name/your loved one.

custom_okay3.message: You know insert name/your loved one best and will be able to identify subtle differences in their well-being.

custom_okay4.message: You know insert name/your loved one best and can create meaningful and engaging activities that are best suited for him/her personally.

custom_okay5.message: Look at your card to send your intention for today.

custom_okay6.message: Think about what's important to you today.  Look at the card if it would help.

custom_okay7.message: Caring for insert name is allowing you to spend quality/important time with insert name.

custom_okay8.message: Your providing a familiar environment for your loved one during a difficult time.

custom_okay9.message: You have developed many useful and creative skills by caring for your loved one.

custom_okay10.message: Caring for your loved one can help improve their well-being.

custom_okay11.message: As their caregiver, you are providing an important companionship for your loved one.

custom_okay12.message: Caregiving has allowed you to return the love and care you have received from insert name over the years.

custom_okay13.message: Your care has allowed insert name's to preserve a sense of self-identity.

custom_okay14.message: You're following through on the promises you made in your wedding vows.

custom_okay15.message: You are an excellent role-model for your kids/grandkids/children/grandchildren.

custom_okay16.message: Your kids/children appreciate the care you provide for insert name.

custom_okay17.message: You are setting a fantastic example of how to love and care for family.

custom_okay18.message: Even though this has been challenging, you have been so strong.

custom_okay19.message: You have overcome so much through this and you're still going

custom_okay20.message: Through caregiving you have strengthened your patience and ability to care for others' needs.

custom_okay21.message: You've strengthened your ability to juggle many things at once by caring for insert name.

custom_okay22.message: Engage insert name in an engaging activity and give yourself a few moments of personal time?

custom_okay23.message: Perform a body scan using your calm app.

custom_okay24.message: Now might be a good time to start an activity with/for your loved one.

custom_okay25.message: You and your loved one may benefit from engaging in an activity that you both enjoy.

custom_okay26.message: Now might be a good time to do something you and insert name love doing together.

custom_yesno1.message: Did you set a goal for yourself today?

custom_yesno2.message: Were you able to complete the self-care goal you set this morning?

custom_yesno3.message: Were there any recommendations you were not able to use or perform today?

custom_yesno4.message: Can you identify any unmet needs that could be contributing to insert name's restlessness? Addressing those needs may help calm him/her down.

custom_yesno5.message: It seems like you and insert name may be experiencing a stressful situation. Is everyone safe?

custom_yesno6.message: Do a scan of the environment. Are there any stressors that may be escalating your situation? If so, attempt to limit or remove those stressors.

custom_yesno7.message: It seems like you could use some uninterrupted personal time, can you engage your loved one in an activity that they enjoy?

custom_yesno8.message: Are you able to set up an activity for your loved one now?

custom_yesno9.message: Can you start an activity with/for insert name that would make you both feel calmer?

custom_multiple1.message: What made it difficult for you to complete your goal?

custom_multiple3.message: Did any of the recommendations help reduce your stress?

custom_multiple4.message: What prevented you from completing the recommendation(s)?

custom_multiple5.message: Why did you choose not to act on the recommendation?

custom_multiple6.message: Is there something about your current environment that is increasing distractions/confusion for insert name.

custom_multiple7.message: Can you modify your surroundings to reduce insert name's confusion/restlessness/distractedness?

custom_slide1.message: On a scale from 1-10, how helpful were today's recommendations?

custom_slide2.message: On a scale from 1 to 5 how stressed did you feel today?

custom_slide3.message: On a scale from 1 to 5 how lonely do you feel today?

custom_helps1.message: Now might be a good time to take a brief break.

custom_helps2.message: Take a quick moment for yourself.

custom_helps3.message: Take some time to "put on your oxygen mask."

custom_helps5.message: It seems like this could be a good time to take a time-out.

custom_helps6.message: Feel free to step away if you need to collect your thoughts.

custom_helps10.message: Breathe in through your nose and out through your mouth.

custom_helps14.message: Try engaging your loved one/insert name in an activity or task that provides them with a sense of ease.
